sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it is given that
\[
	k = \frac{4ij }{i + j }
\]
Then find the value of the expression
\[
	\frac{k + 2i }{k - 2i } + \frac{k + 2j }{k - 2j }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that
\[
	k = \frac{4ij }{i + j }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{k }{2i } = \frac{2j }{i + j }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Applying componendo and dividendo, we get
\[
	\frac{k + 2i }{k - 2i } = \frac{2j + (i + j )}{2j - (i + j )}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{k + 2i }{k - 2i } = \frac{i + 3j }{j - i }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "

Now, from the given expression, we can also write,
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{k }{2j } = \frac{2i }{i + j }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, by applying componendo and dividendo for this equation on both sides, we get
\[
	\frac{k + 2j }{k - 2j } = \frac{2i + (i + j )}{2i - (i + j )}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{k + 2j }{k - 2j } = \frac{3i + j }{i - j }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, by adding the above two expressions, we can get
\[
	\frac{k + 2i }{k - 2i } + \frac{k + 2j }{k - 2j } = \frac{i + 3j }{j - i } + \frac{3i + j }{i - j }
\]
\[
	= \frac{3i + j }{i - j } - \frac{i + 3j }{i - j } 
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \frac{3i + j - i - 3j }{i - j }
\]
\[
	= \frac{2(i - j )}{i - j }
\]
\[
	= 2
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{ Dividing $k = \frac{4ij }{i + j }$ by $2i$, we get $\frac{k }{2i } = \frac{2j }{i + j }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Subsequently applying componendo and dividendo and further simplification leads us to $\frac{k + 2i }{k - 2i } = \frac{i + 3j }{j - i }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{ Dividing $k = \frac{4ij }{i + j }$ by $2j$, we get $\frac{k }{2j } = \frac{2i }{i + j }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Subsequently applying componendo and dividendo and further simplification leads us to $\frac{k + 2j }{k - 2j } = \frac{3i + j }{i - j }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Taking LCM's and then simplifying terms in numerator together we get $\frac{3i + j }{i - j } - \frac{i + 3j }{i - j }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Further simplification will lead us to the result $2$. "}]
